product_name: Black Diamond / Pieps Pro Avalanche Safety Set
long_description: A complete kit for guides, avalanche professionals and serious backcountry skiers, this package includes a Pieps DSP Pro Transceiver, a Black Diamond Evac 7 Shovel and a 320cm Quickdraw Carbon Probe.
short_description: A complete kit for guides, avalanche professionals and serious backcountry skiers, this package includes a Pieps DSP Pro Transceiver, a Black Diamond Evac 7 Shovel and a 320cm Quickdraw Carbon Probe.
